entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:41 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
